thread.title: Lady Amelia Windsor's leopard print cardigan is from the high street - now 15% off
thread.title_full: Lady Amelia Windsor's leopard print cardigan is from the high street - now 15% off

title: Lady Amelia Windsor's leopard print cardigan is from the high street - now 15% off
text:
The 29-year-old royal recently shared an Instagram post in which she sported a gorgeous leopard print cardigan from Nobody's Child - and there's a way to get 15% off When one of the most stylish members of the royal family steps out in a knitwear piece from the high street, you know it's going straight in our shopping baskets. We spotted Amelia Windsor in a gorgeous leopard print cardigan from Nobody's Child in an Instagram post earlier this week, and we fell in love with it immediately.
The Leopard Print Crew Neck Knitted Cardigan costs £65 and comes in sizes XS to L - but the XL is no longer in stock. Crafted from a cosy blend of cotton and wool, it's a neutral and statement piece in one. Plus, you can currently get an extra 15% off the price by entering the code: EXTRA15 at the checkout.
Made with a relatively close cut, the cardi is finished with ribbed trims and a rounded crew neckline that can be fastened by the contrasting pearlescent buttons, making it easy to wear open or closed and still look fabulous - as…
